sqlMap.select: select * FROM edi_esi t WHERE $qry$ $filter$ ORDER BY onboarddate DESC LIMIT $limit$ OFFSET $start$
select count(*) AS counts FROM edi_esi t WHERE $qry$ $filter$
select * FROM _edi_esidtlcnt t WHERE $qry$ $filter$ order by id
select count(*) AS counts FROM edi_esidtlcnt t WHERE $qry$ $filter$
select * FROM edi_esidtlfee t WHERE $qry$ $filter$ order by id
select count(*) AS counts FROM edi_esidtlfee t WHERE $qry$ $filter$
select * FROM _edi_esi_cntchoose t WHERE $qry$ $filter$ order by nos
select count(*) AS counts FROM _edi_esi_cntchoose t WHERE $qry$ $filter$
select * FROM edi_esidtlcntlist t WHERE $qry$ $filter$ order by id
select count(*) AS counts FROM edi_esidtlcntlist t WHERE $qry$ $filter$
select * FROM _edi_esidtlcnt t WHERE $qry$ $filter$ order by id
select count(*) AS counts FROM _edi_esidtlcnt t WHERE $qry$ $filter$
